languages.text: {n}На Инцендию тяжело смотреть долго — ее пылающие, словно угли, глаза притягивают взгляд, гипнотизируют и вызывают постыдное желание потупить взор.{/n}

{n}It is difficult to look at Incendia for long — you cannot stop glancing at her eyes, burning like embers, their gaze so hypnotising and oppressive that it fills you with the shameful urge to cast your eyes down.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На Инцендию тяжело смотреть долго — ее пылающие, словно угли, глаза притягивают взгляд, гипнотизируют и вызывают постыдное желание потупить взор.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你很难始终盯着因森蒂娅。你会情不自禁地凝视她的眼睛，她的双眼像戒严一样灼热，目光充满了催眠与压迫的意味。这让你情不自禁地产生了羞愧的冲动，想赶紧低下头来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to look at Incendia for long — you cannot stop glancing at her eyes, burning like embers, their gaze so hypnotising and oppressive that it fills you with the shameful urge to cast your eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你很难始终盯着因森蒂娅。你会情不自禁地凝视她的眼睛，她的双眼像戒严一样灼热，目光充满了催眠与压迫的意味。这让你情不自禁地产生了羞愧的冲动，想赶紧低下头来。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアを長時間見つめ続けるのは困難だ。燃えさかる炎のような瞳に釘付けになる。催眠術のように圧迫感のある視線に恥ずかしい衝動を覚え、つい視線を外したくなってしまう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to look at Incendia for long — you cannot stop glancing at her eyes, burning like embers, their gaze so hypnotising and oppressive that it fills you with the shameful urge to cast your eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアを長時間見つめ続けるのは困難だ。燃えさかる炎のような瞳に釘付けになる。催眠術のように圧迫感のある視線に恥ずかしい衝動を覚え、つい視線を外したくなってしまう。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Es difícil mirar a Incendia durante mucho rato, pero no puedes parar de mirar sus ojos, ardientes como ascuas, esa mirada tan hipnotizadora y opresiva que hace que te invada el vergonzoso impulso de bajar la mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to look at Incendia for long — you cannot stop glancing at her eyes, burning like embers, their gaze so hypnotising and oppressive that it fills you with the shameful urge to cast your eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es difícil mirar a Incendia durante mucho rato, pero no puedes parar de mirar sus ojos, ardientes como ascuas, esa mirada tan hipnotizadora y opresiva que hace que te invada el vergonzoso impulso de bajar la mirada.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Es ist schwer, Incendia länger anzusehen, Du kannst nicht anders, als immer wieder zu ihren Augen zu blicken, die wie Glut brennen. Ihr Blick ist derart hypnotisierend und erdrückend, dass er dich mit dem schmachvollen Verlangen erfüllt, zu Boden zu sehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to look at Incendia for long — you cannot stop glancing at her eyes, burning like embers, their gaze so hypnotising and oppressive that it fills you with the shameful urge to cast your eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist schwer, Incendia länger anzusehen, Du kannst nicht anders, als immer wieder zu ihren Augen zu blicken, die wie Glut brennen. Ihr Blick ist derart hypnotisierend und erdrückend, dass er dich mit dem schmachvollen Verlangen erfüllt, zu Boden zu sehen.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Vous ne parvenez pas à examiner Incendia assez longtemps pour en tirer la moindre information. Votre regard est irrésistiblement attiré par ses yeux ardents comme des braises, si hypnotiques et oppressants qu'ils vous poussent à baisser honteusement la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to look at Incendia for long — you cannot stop glancing at her eyes, burning like embers, their gaze so hypnotising and oppressive that it fills you with the shameful urge to cast your eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne parvenez pas à examiner Incendia assez longtemps pour en tirer la moindre information. Votre regard est irrésistiblement attiré par ses yeux ardents comme des braises, si hypnotiques et oppressants qu'ils vous poussent à baisser honteusement la tête.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia'ya uzun süre bakabilmek çok zor. Köz gibi yanan gözlerine kısa bakışlar atmaktan kendini alamıyorsun. Hipnotize edici ve ezici bakışları, sende gözlerini utanç içinde yere indirme dürtüsü uyandırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to look at Incendia for long — you cannot stop glancing at her eyes, burning like embers, their gaze so hypnotising and oppressive that it fills you with the shameful urge to cast your eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia'ya uzun süre bakabilmek çok zor. Köz gibi yanan gözlerine kısa bakışlar atmaktan kendini alamıyorsun. Hipnotize edici ve ezici bakışları, sende gözlerini utanç içinde yere indirme dürtüsü uyandırıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
